articles.title: As some people push to make profound autism its own diagnosis, this Ayer family is raising twins with it
articles.description:
Some in the autism community worry that a separate diagnosis would reduce attention to individuals on the broader spectrum.

The post As some people push to make profound autism its own diagnosis, this Ayer family is raising twins with it appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ayer family raises twins diagnosed with profound autism, highlighting unique challenges.
Community debates separate diagnosis for profound autism, affecting broader autism spectrum awareness.
Potential changes in diagnosis may impact resources and support for Boston families with autism.
